<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.70

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Controls Table

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns metadata (number) associated with a particular row of RscControlsTable.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> control '''ctValue''' index

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> index: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_number = _control [[ctValue]] 0;</code>

</value></part></template>
